title: Budget; bring forward code sections related to and provide for transfers.
subject: Appropriations

extras.summary: AN ACT TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 27-103-125, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH RELATES TO THE BUDGET PROCESS, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 27-103-139, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH RELATES TO THE BUDGET PROCESS, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 27-103-203, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH RELATES TO THE BUDGET PROCESS, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 27-103-211, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH RELATES TO THE BUDGET PROCESS, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 27-103-213, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH RELATES TO THE BUDGET PROCESS, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO BRING FORWARD SECTION 27-103-303, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, WHICH RELATES TO THE BUDGET PROCESS, FOR PURPOSES OF POSSIBLE AMENDMENT; TO DIRECT THE STATE TREASURER, IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE STATE FISCAL OFFICER, TO TRANSFER CERTAIN FUNDS DURING FISCAL YEAR 2027 FROM THE CAPITAL EXPENSE FUND; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
